name: 電腦輔助設計與製造
description: 本課程將指導學生熟悉電腦輔助設計及製造 (CAD/CAM)在產品設計開發與製造上的應用，並以軟體作為設計與製造工具，使其學生了解在工程設計領域產業的動向及應用發展，將利用檔案轉換至機台上進行製作，並了解目前電腦輔助製造所包含的技術與工具。
goals: 培養學生對於電腦輔助設計與製造的具體概念，以實際案例、實機操作之訓練方式來加強學生軟體技能
培養學生基本繪圖、造型設計能力及創意設計能力
以CNC等教學輔具來輔助學生對量產可行性之觀念建立與學習
訓練學生生具備相當程度的CAD/CAM能力
訓練學生生具備相當程度的CAD/CAM能力。

**教學方法:**Students will learn how to use numerical methods to solve and simulate practical problems with emphasis on analysis, algorithm, and implementation. Specifically, students will possess to be capable of performing programming in AUTOCAD or some other basic computer aided design, e.g. Pro/e, Solidworks, UG, and CATIA and so on, including writing procedures, importing/exporting data to a file, and working with various data types.

  
\----------------------------------------------------------------------------

**評量方法****:**

Students are expected to submit your assignments, personal and the group project but attending the class. The final report is very restricted, so there is no chance to adjust your final report (total grade). Please sincerely consider this issue. If you could not accept the policies of this course, please do not consider to take this course.
